mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tb_song
artist_id, name, album, duration, style, cover_path, audio_path, release_time, play_count,
#{artistId}, #{name}, #{album}, #{duration}, #{style}, #{coverPath}, #{audioPath}, #{releaseTime}, #{playCount},
mapper.update: update tb_song set play_count=#{count} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_song WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')

SELECT s.id as id, s.artist_id as artistId, a.artist_name as artistName, s.name as name, s.album, s.duration, s.style, s.cover_path as coverPath, s.audio_path as audioPath, s.release_time as releaseTime, s.play_count as playCount FROM tb_song s LEFT JOIN tb_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id WHERE s.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')

SELECT s.id as id, s.artist_id as artistId, a.artist_name as artistName, s.name as name, s.album, s.duration, s.style, s.cover_path as coverPath, s.audio_path as audioPath, s.release_time as releaseTime, s.play_count as playCount FROM tb_song s LEFT JOIN tb_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id WHERE s.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{songName}, '%') ORDER BY s.id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT s.id as id, s.artist_id as artistId, a.artist_name as artistName, s.name as name, s.album, s.duration, s.style, s.cover_path as coverPath, s.audio_path as audioPath, s.release_time as releaseTime, s.play_count as playCount FROM tb_song s LEFT JOIN tb_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id ORDER BY s.id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_song WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{songName}, '%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_song WHERE style = #{style}

SELECT s.id as id, s.artist_id as artistId, a.artist_name as artistName, s.name as name, s.album, s.duration, s.style, s.cover_path as coverPath, s.audio_path as audioPath, s.release_time as releaseTime, s.play_count as playCount FROM tb_song s LEFT JOIN tb_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id WHERE s.style = #{style} ORDER BY s.id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT s.id, s.artist_id, a.artist_name AS artist_name, s.name AS name, s.album, s.duration, s.style, s.cover_path as coverPath, s.release_time, s.play_count FROM tb_song s INNER JOIN tb_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id WHERE s.id >= (SELECT FLOOR(RAND() * (SELECT MAX(id) FROM tb_song))) ORDER BY s.id LIMIT #{limit}
